channel.title: Elixir on Glenn Roberts
channel.description: Recent content in Elixir on Glenn Roberts

item.title: How to test your Elixir Phoenix LiveView apps with k6.
item.description: Elixir and Phoenix tout high performance with low hardware requirements, and microsecond (μs) response times.

item.title: Circle Shift an Array in Elixir
item.description: I recently came across a problem in Elixir where I needed to shift a list of items by a given offset aka an “Array Circular shift.
